title: Tingtun PDF Checker
creator: Tingtun
description: Checks PDF documents based on WCAG 2.0. Upload or refer to online documents to generate report with detected barriers and proposed remedies. Tingtun PDF checker is an online, open source tool, used both in practical quality assurance and monitoring of national document quality.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
